products.name: Ulanzi BG-3 Powerbank Hand Grip with Mini Tripod for Camera Smartphone
products.desc:
The BG-3 10,000mAh Power Handgrip from Ulanzi offers a lot of versatility in a compact design with a silicone grip that's comfortable to use in all weather environments. The Power Handgrip can be a handy companion for virtually all users, and it's useful especially for mobile shooters and vloggers. The Power Handgrip is a 10,000mAh power bank that can be used as a power handgrip or mounted on an included mini tripod. Or you can simply carry it with you to use as a charger.

Attach Numerous Devices
To a 1/4"-20 screw on top, you can attach action cams, smartphone holders, compact mirrorless cameras, LED lights, mics, and many other devices, using an adapter where necessary.

Dual USB Power Bank
A USB Type-A port lets you run power to your camera or other device as it's mounted on top during production. A bidirectional USB Type-C port allows you to charge a smartphone or other mobile device, or to recharge the Power Handgrip. When recharging, it supports QC protocol fast charging at 18W input, and LED indicators confirm charging status. The USB Type-A and Type-C ports can be used at the same time.

Tripod Mode
Attach an included ultracompact mini tripod to the 1/4"-20 thread on the bottom and use the Power Handgrip as a tripod or stand for your camera, light, or other device. Tripod Mode allows you to achieve static shots, timelapse capture, and much more.

-Battery Capacity: 10,000 mAh
-Connectors: 1 x USB Type-A, 1 x USB Type-C (Bidirectional)
-Input: 18W (Over USB Type-C)
-Material: Silicone Grip

products.desc:
Nikon MB-N11 Grip Power Battery Pack / Nikon MBN11 / MB N 11 ORIGINAL

Non Warranty - 100% ORIGINAL

For Z 6 II and Z 7 II Cameras
Accepts Two EN-EL15 Batteries
Hot-Swappable Battery Slot
Extended Grip for Vertical Composition
Second Shutter Release, Dials, Fn Button
USB Type-C Port for Power or Tethering

For the portrait shooter who needs to shoot vertically, the landscape photographer recording lengthy time-lapse sequences and the sports photographer desiring a more balanced feel while using long lenses, the MB-N11 is the ideal accessory. Designed specifically for the Nikon Z 7II and Z 6II mirrorless cameras, the MB-N11 is a Multi-Power Battery Pack with vertical shutter button, main and sub command dials, AF-ON button, sub selector and Fn buttons. Plus, when using two EN-EL 15c batteries, the MB-N11 provides 1.9x (CIPA standard). Increase in battery performance over an EN-EL 15c battery in the camera alone. And the batteries are hot-swappable, meaning you won’t have to stop shooting or recording to swap batteries!

The MB-N11 also features an improved grip and dust and drip protection like that of the rest of the Z series cameras. In addition to powering the camera, the MB-N11 features a USB-C connection which means you can power the batteries from a portable charger or AC power supply, even while connected to a computer. Or charge the batteries within the grip via USB when you’re not using the camera.

Highlights :
* For EOS 70D and 80D Cameras
* Comfort and Control in Vertical Position
* Vertical Position Shutter Release Button
* Vertical Position Control Buttons & Dial
* Extends Shooting Time
* Holds Two LP-E6 Batteries

Features :
The Canon BG-E14 Battery Grip is compatible with the Canon EOS 70D and 80D DSLR Cameras and provides improved handling, versatile control, and extended battery life when in use. It accepts up to two LP-E6 lithium-ion battery packs to effectively double the camera's battery life. products.desc:
BARANG 100% ORIGINAL SMALLRIG

BARANG 100% GARANSI RESMI 2 TAHUN SMALLRIG INDONESIA

GARANSI 14 HARI GANTI BARU HANYA UNTUK KERUSAKAN DARI PABRIK BUKAN DARI PENGGUNA ATAU USER

MAU TAMBAH HEMAT LAGI BELANJANYA DI TOKO KITA? PAKAI KODE VOUCHER "KUPON ONGKIR" UNTUK MENDAPATKAN GRATIS ONGKIR 50RB SETIAP BELANJA DI TOKO KITA YG SEDANG PROMO.

SmallRig NP-F Battery Adapter Plate Lite 3018 is designed to provide greater battery life for your camera rig via a Sony NP-F battery. It provides different output ports, including a 12V DC (5.5/2.5mm) output port and a 7.4V DC (5.5/2.1mm) output port. It features an LED indicator that will turn red when the battery level is less than 30 percent. When the indicator flashes, it means the battery level is less than 10 percent, and you need to replace the battery. The plate features a rubber pad on the bottom for a more stable installation.

Key Features:
1. The plate fits Sony NP-F type batteries to provide greater battery life for your camera rig.

products.desc:
Camera Hand Grip for Fujifilm X-T30, X-T20 and X-T10

JJC HG-XT30 Camera Hand Grip is designed for Fujifilm X-T30, X-T20 and X-T10 cameras. It is made of premium aluminium alloy, which is sturdy and durable. This kind of metal construction is also a perfect match to the camera body. The hand grip is anti-slip and can provide you with a kind of comfortable hand feeling due to the microfiber leather on its surface. After attaching the hand grip to your camera, you will enjoy a more comfortable and secure hold for your shooting. The large opening on the bottom allows you to remove your battery and memory card without taking off the whole grip. It also comes with a speaker hole for easily accessing to your camera speaker. The bottom of the hand grip adopts Arca Swiss Type quick release plate design, you can mount this hand grip to Arca Swiss System tripods directly. Or your can mount it to other tripods or devices via the 1/4"-20 tripod socket. Featuring chamfer design, this hand grip will not affect the usage of your fold-out screen. Moreover, the hand grip features a slot for connecting a wrist strap, the JJC HS-ML1M(Sold Separately). JJC HG-XT30 replaces Fujifilm MHG-XT10.
